publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4127 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to Excellent Hazeldene Nursery Schoolâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Hazeldene Nursery School in East Renfrewshire for the excellent HM Inspectorate of Education report that it has received; notes that in the report Hazeldene Nursery School received five excellent ratings, and further notes that the high quality learning opportunities and the exceptional commitment of the head teacher and staff to improving the work of the nursery were also praised in the report.
